message.body: Hmmm accidentally set fire alarm off- how do you turn it off
Figured it out! Thnx! Front door system is fancy !
OK. Did Alex show you how to turn it off?
That's a useful skill!!
no I'm just clever
lol jk
Did you talk to Alex about doing some planting? If we are going to do any planting this season we probably need to do it very soon.
I planted some sunflowers by side of house
Seeds tho so who knows
Do you know much about gardening? I don't but Jo used to do a lot of gardening back home.
That's Awesome!!
All along right right and some by left side of steps , we'll see if they Grow
*right side of house
No I'm awful at it, along w cooking... Hence setting off the alarm
So def let Alex take care of real planting lol my idea of gardening is googling 'how do you plant sunflowers'
Which is what I did and sorta followed it who knows if it'll work
We should plant so the blooming is staggered
But that's some next level sh*t lol
So Alex can do that lol
Hahaha! I'll talk to Jo & Alex & see if it is worth doing some planting this year. I'd like to plant some perennials - things that come back year after year.
Yes exactly
And replanting the grass
Replanting the grass is pretty major project. I actually did it myself years ago but didn't water enough & it all died in the summer.
It's something I'd like to do again but to do it right is a lot of work. First we really should rent a tiller & dig everything up. We need to plant either early fall or early spring.
It would be really nice to have a nice lawn.
